body.name: VIOFO A229 Plus Dash Cam with Dual STARVIS 2 Sensors, 2 Channel HDR, 1440P+1440P Front and Rear, Voice Control Car Dash Camera, 5GHz Wi-Fi, Ultra-Precise GPS, 24 Hours Parking Mode, Support 512GB Max
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 1 hr 34 mins
features: 【Dual channel Sony STARVIS 2 Sensors】The A229 Plus is the first Front and Rear dashcam to feature two Sony STARVIS 2 IMX675 image sensors. This advanced technology offers 2.5 times dynamic range and 2.5 times light sensitivity compared to STARVIS, resulting in reduced noise and motion blur during night recording. The A229 Plus provides the ultimate solution for capturing clear and detailed footage, making it a revolutionary addition to any driver's safety toolkit.

【HDR Front & Rear Recording】The A229 Plus dash camera is a game-changer in the industry, setting the standard for dashcams with its advanced Dual-Channel HDR technology. This reveals accurate 2K details even in fast-moving scenarios, and its exceptional ability to capture car license details makes it stand out from the competition. (Note: The front cam 1440P 60fps is not available while HDR is enabled. )

【2-channel 1440P recording】The A229 Plus dashcam offers upgraded 2K + 2K front and rear recording capabilities with 1440P resolution for high-definition recording effects. This innovative dash camera provides exceptional clarity and color saturation, enabling true 1440P detail reproduction and enhanced color accuracy. The front camera has a high frame rate of up to 60fps, ensuring crystal-clear images, accurate color representation, and perfectly balanced exposure levels.

【Hands-free Voice Control & Notification】Go hands-free with the A229 Plus dashcam's 12 voice commands, including take photo, lock the video, turn on WiFi, and show front/rear camera and so on. A229 Plus Dual channel dashcam also provides clear notifications for settings changes or memory card errors, keeping you focused on the road and enabling you to control your dashcam easily and safely.

【Ultra-Precise GPS】The A229 Plus is equipped with a state-of-the-art Quad-Mode GPS module that supports 4 satellite positioning systems: GPS, BEIDOU, GALILEO, and GLONASS. This advanced feature significantly enhances the accuracy and stability of the positioning. lt provides detailedlocation, speed, and time data of the vehicle when playing back the video on VIOFO App or computer.

【Ultra Fast 5GHz Wi-Fi】The A229 Plus 2-Channel dashcam is equipped with an upgraded 5GHz Wi-Fi connection module, providing much faster Wi-Fi data transfer for smooth video previewing, downloading, and sharing. A229 Plus dashcam connects to the VIOFO App via Wi-Fi, allowing users to access real-time footage, take photos, download photos/videos to their phone. Users can also adjust settings such as resolution level, recording duration, and G-sensor sensitivity.

【24/7 3 Parking Mode Solutions】The A229 Plus provides 3 24-hour parking mode options: ①Auto Event Detection, supported by a buffered function. The camera will automatically start recording and save the video for 15 seconds before and 30 seconds after the detected event; ②Time Lapse, which continuously records at low frames per second; ③Low Bitrate: which records continuously in a smaller file size.

【Friendly User Interface & Installation】The A229 Plus features an upgraded menu that displays the dashcam's connection and memory card formatting status for easy viewing. The menu functionality has been streamlined and made more user-friendly, making it easier to operate. The compact interior and rear cameras make installation simpler and more flexible, allowing for versatile mounting positions.

【100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION】The A229 Plus 2 Channel dash camera is backed by a full 1-YEAR WARRANTY. To extend the warranty from 12 months to 18 months, you can register the product information on our official VIOFO website. If you have any questions about this product, please contact our VIOFO.LTD. We will resolve any issues within 24 hours. If you are not satisfied with the product, it comes with a FULL REFUND within 30 DAYS of purchase. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

📌【Optional Memory Card Recommendation】There is no SD card included with the A229 Plus dash camera. We highly recommend VIOFO industrial high endurance microSD cards for optimal performance and durability when using your dashcam. These cards are specifically optimized for dashcam recording, ensuring compatibility and long-lasting durability. We offer a variety of options to fit your needs, including 128GB, 256GB, and 512GB capacities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Had a problem but the company helped me with it.
reviews.reviewText: I got this dash cam for my birthday. I was very happy with it. The images were excellent, the data transfer to my computer was smoothly every time. I started accumulating crazy incidents on the road almost immediately. I don’t know what’s in the water here in Eugene, OR, but people drive a bit weird.The problem.After installation, well, exactly 10 days after installation the unit failed. First, the main camera would not record, the file would form but my computer wasn’t able to see the corrupted file. The back camera kept working but those files also would be corrupted. Then the main screen went all purple, see attached picture. The voice commands, which is one of the best nicest features of this dash cam always continued to work perfectly. I reset the thing 3 times but the errors continued. I was so frustrated that I unplugged the dash cam and gave up. I don’t know what happened but when I tried to find costumer service for Viofo, I was directed to a sight where people were posting issues, but there were no solutions there. I was like a forum.The Solution.I forgot about the dash cam for a while. Life happens. Anyhow, one day I was messing around with Amazon and the item came to my attention. I decided to put a review complaining about my experience with the camera and the failure. Incredibly, not 24 hours after that review, the company contacted my using the Amazon system. They were very concern about my issues with their dash cam and extremely apologetic that I had to go through those situations with it. At the end, we could not solve the issues and they decided to issue me a complete refund. I had to send them the dash cam so they could do an autopsy of the thing and see what went wrong, I figure a bad chip somewhere. It happens from time to time wit electronics. Belive me, I had my fair share of bad machines in my life. But one thing I have never had is a company handle a situation like that as efficiently, and fast as Viofo did with me. I am dry happy and pleasantly surprised of their reaction to my review. If toy ever have a problem with any of their products, contact them, they will help you right away to solve your problems or refund you in full if they can’t help you. To Viofo I say, thanks you guys for all your help with my problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I strongly recommend this dashcam (A229 Duo Front & Rear)
reviews.reviewText: I watched and read about a dozen reviews prior to purchasing this dashcam. The biggest determinant for me was the implementation of Parking Mode (which includes it's myriad of features and settings) and I am VERY pleased with the features and settings that this camera system provides. Thumbs way up for the A229 Duo!PROS:It does many things really, really well and while I am still in the first week of actual use, I can already tell that this one is a keeper, from the excellent menu layout to the minimalistic design of both cameras and their cable connection locations. I just hope it is well-made and lasts a good, long time.I think the best feature of this camera is the super capacitor, in lieu of the lithium battery that we typically see in most other dashcams. This is a technological innovation and leads to a cooler running and longer life, in my opinion.I also love the small display screen and buttons on this camera because I don't EVER have to use the app in order to review videos, make setting changes, etc.The single coaxial cable to the rear camera is super thin, stiff and tough and was just long enough to run from the head of the dashboard to the center of the rear hatch window of my Volvo XC60. Many reviewers and videos are out there so I will not repeat what many others have discussed but I think the plethora of menu options and the fact that I can use it without an app if I choose are two of its greatest strengths.The Parking Mode on this camera is the main reason why I chose VioFo over the other brands. Everything about this mode is what I was looking for - motion detection with three sensitivity settings or time lapse with several different frame rates (WOW!), then you can set the bit rate, too and the resolution. It is pretty crazy to have so much control over things that it could be a CON to some people (so I listed this as one, below)The hardwire kit (sold separately) makes the Parking Mode recording possible and this simple to install kit deserves recognition for affordability (other kits from other OEMs actually cost a lot more) and even has a physical voltage drop protection toggle switch to protect your car's battery.CONS:The Menu/REC button does not always register my press to enter the menu. I've had to power it down, then restart it a few times over the last two weeks. Rebooting takes a few seconds so it has not been any trouble. I don't see this as any sort of dealbreaker.I mentioned that there are lots of different options to configure and for me, it is pure love. I will be spending a week or two fine tuning the experience but there are probably many folks out there who will find the dozen or so settings and sub-menus a little daunting, especially if they are not tech-savvy. The manual is not the best so I would suggest looking on YouTube and the VioFo websites for instructions and help. Tech support will be key for you. I listed this as a CON not for me but for those whose eyes glaze over when we start talking about 2K resolution (is not really 2K on this device, it's actually a little higher!) and don't know how to calculate GMT from their local time zone.I only have one concern and it is with any dashcam with a parking mode - what effect will this have on the alternator over a long period of time (say, a year or more)? For the convenience this technology gives me, I'm ok to go along for the ride ;-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great all around dash cam
reviews.reviewText: Solid feature set and very good quality. I believe this model hits the sweet spot as far as resolution goes. Although you're not getting 4K, it more than makes up for it in low light performance. The 2K rear camera produces great quality video as well. The smaller connectors on the rear video cable were a plus as far as routing around pillars and through the headliner, but be very careful as the connector ends are very delicate. I ended up damaging one end when it got stuck behind the B pillar on my truck. I'd recommend wrapping the ends with some electrical tape before subjecting it to any rough handling. In case you're in a bind and need a replacement cable quick, the Blackvue coax cable with MCX connectors will work for the Viofo rear camera (although the plugs don't seat as far into the camera as the original) and you can get it from Amazon in 2 days. Getting Viofo customer support to send me a replacement cable was a slow process that was going to take a month with shipping and a Chinese holiday.The 5 Ghz wireless and the phone app work great once you figure it out. I had to put my Iphone into airplane mode before it would stay connected to the dash cam. Once it's connected, it's very easy to change settings and the 5 Ghz WIFI makes managing video clips quick and painless. Make sure you use a high endurance SD card as Viofo recommends (Samsung Pro Endurance, Sandisk High Endurance, or Viofo brands). Also, ensure you're buying your card from a reputable seller such as Amazon so you don't get stuck with a counterfeit SD card that will drive you nuts when troubleshooting camera issues.I'd also recommend getting the circular polarization filter for the front camera to get rid of glare on the dash and windshield. Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase.

After using the VIOFO a229 Dual 2K dash camera for three months I can honestly say this is by far the nicest dash cam I've owned so far. It is also the most expensive camera I've had and I have to admit, the quality of both the build and video is superior to my previous cameras so I feel the price is justified. In my experience you truly do get what you pay for.Video quality in the daylight is very nice. In the dark or at night, much like every other dash camera you do lose detail but it is still good enough to do the job it is intended for. I have yet to see any dash camera that produces excellent night results. That just asks too much of the current technology and to be honest, if it was able to happen, the price of the dash cam would be much more expensive. But I'm am completely happy with the video output.VERY IMPORTANT: Make sure you order and use a recommended MicroSD card. Others have had issues but I made sure I got a quality card and haven't had any issues yet.I also ordered the polarized lens cover which helps with reflections and glare on the windshield. And I have purchased the Bluetooth remote trigger to lock videos and it works very well so far.I have no issues recommending this camera to others. My only advice would be to save it to a wish list and monitor for price changes as it does go on sale for much less from time to time. I got mine at a reduced cost.
I feel confident using my VIOFO car cam. The video is clear, captures number plates easily and also clear video at night, I would highly recommend this car cam.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice set up. Improved over the older models.
reviews.reviewText: Mostly I like how the WIFI actually works on this one. I never did get it going on the 119 I had before.
As dash cams go this is right up there for value for money. A bit of patience and the hard wire kit and you can save yourself hundreds.

This is very easy to install. I got the Viofo hardwire kit so I could do parking recording too. The rear camera cable was plenty long for my 23 Honda Pilot, there was extra I had to bundle.I like how it comes with those clear protectors, I used them for the rear window so I don't damage the defroster when removing it.The recorded video is easy access via wifi on my iphone through the Viofo app.I got a SanDisk 256GB card, plenty of storage to record on the highest setting.There are so many settings you can set it up anyway you like it.I love this camera kit so much I bought another one to replace my old A119.Highly recommended!
